Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2016 09:15AM mama26 wrote: Hi all. Haven't been on here in a while. No RADS for me as I had a clear path report!!! I am officially cancer free! My biggest complaint from surgery is the muscle spasms. My chest gets as hard as a rock. I am taking muscle relaxers but they aren't working very well. I've tried a heating pad also with little relief. I have my first fill next week. I hope that doesn't make the spasms worse. I'm hoping for great results for all of you as well. Take care. Melanie

Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2016 03:14AM - edited Jan 29, 2016 03:15AM by mama26 Hi all. Surgery went well and I should go home today. I had quite a bit of pain due to tissue expander placement. They said I was having muscle spasms in my pectoral muscles. Ouch. I hope all of the other surgeries went well too. Praying for all.
